description:
spec: s/char_lit/rune_lit/

The spec talks explicitly about rune literals but the
respective production is still called char_lit for
historic reasons. Updated the two occurences.

Fixes issue 4602.

spec: s/char_lit/rune_lit/

The spec talks explicitly about rune literals but the
respective production is still called char_lit for
historic reasons. Updated the two occurences.

Fixes issue 4602.
